name: Micro Dungeon (Derabo)
description:
controls: WASD/Arrow Keys

A tiny game done for the 45th MiniJam (theme: pocket sized dungeon)

I wanted to see if I'm able to finish a game in one day and this theme was the perfect fit!

Since I needed a little challenge for myself I coded the pathfinding algorithm from scratch. It's not perfect yet so if it bugs out and makes you lose a level I'm sorry :(
